title: Low Priority Queues
body:
I am sick to death of getting this shit low Priority Queue, I had 4 of my 5 completed, And i about to start my 5th game so i can complete it and not have a queue timeer, And then my league of legends corrupts and gives me errors when I get into the game, And now I got another 5 more, For frig sake man.

And I bet all the responses i get here will be " unlucky man " or " we cant do anything about this "


Im so done with this stupid shit.

replies.body:
No... that's not what I say. To say "Bad luck," is to admit defeat in repairing what can be ultimately fixed and that's not my philosophy.

All issues can be fixed if we have the information and time. What error are you getting exactly? What happens in detail? What OS do you have? Your rig specs?
